page.title: 04THE RIVER(CONTINUED)
page.content: The race takes place from Wasperton to Stratford down seven and a half miles of the Avon.The first raft leaves at 9 a.m.The last raft starts at lunch time.The first rafts usually arrive in Stratford about 11 a.m. Boating: The Boat house has 42 rowing boats,12 canoes and 6 punts.It is 80p per person for an hour on the river.For children it is 40p if supervised.There is a Â£5 deposit on rowing boats and canoes but Â£10 for punts as they are more valuable.The busiest time of year for hiring is from May until September. Ferry: The ferry crosses the river by the Memorial Theatre.It is 15p per person and is run by a chain under the surface of the water.
